= Release Notes =

== Version 0.1 01.01.2010 ==

Vosao CMS version 0.1 is out. This is the first version in alpha cycle releases.

This release introduce security model based on ACL for user groups in the CMS administration area for pages/resources and web site access control. It's now possible to create restricted content on the web site when only registered users can access content (web pages, file downloads). Hope this will help accelerate Vosao use in the enterprise.

Clean installation:

 # Upload version 0.1 and select it as the default version
 # Run site root url /. Default site will be installed.

Version upgrade steps:

 # Upload version 0.1 and select it as the default version
 # Run update url "/update". Database schema will be automatically updated.

== Version 0.0.4 17.11.2009 ==

Vosao CMS version 0.0.4 is out. This is the last version in working prototype cycle releases. Next releases cycle will be alpha. This means that project has stabilized architecture and framework set.

Clean installation:

 # Upload version 0.0.4 and select it as the default version
 # Run site root url /. Default site will be installed.

Version upgrade steps:

 # Upload version 0.0.4 and select it as the default version
 # Run update url /update. Database schema will be automatically updated.

Incompatibility with previous version:

 # Due to adding multilanguage support some velocity variables and services changed it's names and structure. Please read template documentation section.

Implemented and fixed issues:

 # [http://code.google.com/p/vosao/issues/detail?id=30 Added users administration dialog.]
 # [http://code.google.com/p/vosao/issues/detail?id=48 Added i18n for pages and templates]
 # [http://code.google.com/p/vosao/issues/detail?id=50 Refactor js messages]
 # [http://code.google.com/p/vosao/issues/detail?id=51 Add content versioning support]

== Version 0.0.2 02.10.2009 ==

In this version database schema was changed and unfortunately complete database cleaning is required. Please follow these instructions to upgrade running sites.

Clean installation:

 # Upload version 0.0.2 and select it as the default version
 # run setup url /setup

Version upgrade steps:

 # In application running previous version make site export
 # Upload version 0.0.2 and select it as the default version
 # Completely clean the database except UserEntity table.
 # run setup url /setup
 # Import previously exported site
